data.eml:eml: New Indo-Pacific species of Dasyrhicnoessa Hendel, 1934 and Pseudorhicnoessa Malloch, 1914 (Diptera: Canacidae: Tethininae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Munari, Lorenzo (2014): New Indo-Pacific species of Dasyrhicnoessa Hendel, 1934 and Pseudorhicnoessa Malloch, 1914 (Diptera: Canacidae: Tethininae). Zootaxa 3784 (3): 281-293, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3784.3.8
